subject: Baseball
Television
Deafness
Citi Field (NYC)
lead_paragraph: Cory Macchiarola provides captions for the hearing-impaired at the Mets’ Citi Field and on television, bringing baseball to the deaf.
snippet: Cory Macchiarola provides captions for the hearing-impaired at the Mets’ Citi Field and on television, bringing baseball to the deaf.
